extendedInfo.description: Game description:   This is a flight shooting invented a class of small game, in the vastness of the sky, there just have evil, and have a bright but also dark in the black castle controlled airspace, the one of the brave with its courage and strength to fight with a powerful evil forces in a fierce air combat excitement kicked off between birds. Floating in the air inside the black castle stationed a large number of birds, which BOSS is extremely fierce, if you want to solve this piece of the sky to fight to the death with the BOSS. Come and experience it. . . Rules of the game:   Condor configure a variety of weapons, the player through the use of these weapons attack on the incoming birds, each bird is equipped with its own weapons of mass destruction of all birds are different, the power of weapons will be improved with the relevant level . When a player down after a certain number of birds in the BOSS Black Castle will be sent out (the player can also directly attack the BOSS Black Castle will lead to, but this operation may lead to a lot of birds out, and the scene will be difficult to control), players will kill BOSS will automatically obtain the weapons it uses the same time, there will be a gorgeous screen, the mystery of the door, as long as the flight will go to the next level.   The weapons the game has a certain energy consumption, the greater the energy consumption of the power of the more powerful, players can kill the birds get their drop after the blue energy mushroom supplement. Need to acquire additional physical strength red mushroom. Instructions:   This is a cross-screen games, players can adjust the phone from side to side direction of flight of the Condor.   Through the instrument panel lower right corner of the flight speed can directly modify its flight speed.   Click the right of the screen can switch the current weapon to the next weapon.In addition prior to clicking anywhere on the screen both for the fire.Keywords:   Flying,Eagle,combat,air combat,game,birds,shooting
